articles.title: African Queens: Njinga review – Jada Pinkett Smith’s docudrama is like a mediocre Channel 5 show - The Guardian
articles.description: This tale of a 17th-century African female ruler features impressive academics, but they’re drowned out by poor-quality dramatic sequences. It lacks context, analysis or personality
articles.content: There was a time, not so very long ago, when Black people rarely featured in period drama or documentary and even then, only as slaves. Other historical stories from Africa and her diaspora of scient… [+4670 chars]
